data.title: Paid Surveys - Rapid Rewards for Opinions
data.meta_description: Southwest wants to hear from you through Rewards for Opinions. Our online survey can earn you e-rewards. Check here for more e-rewards information.
data.text:
As a Rapid RewardsÂ® Member, you can earn Rapid Rewards points just by sharing your thoughts through Rewards for Opinions. Participate in market research surveys, learn more about topics you care about, and earn Rapid Rewards points for your time.*

Here's why you'll love it:

Completely free to join

Participate whenever you want

Earn points for every survey you take

Sign up today, and receive 500 Rapid Rewards bonus points when you complete your first survey within three months of enrolling.*

Not a Rapid Rewards Member? Enroll here.

All Rapid Rewards rules and regulations apply and can be found at Southwest.com/rrterms.

*Rapid Rewards bonus points are only available to newly enrolled Members who complete their first survey within three months of enrolling. Please allow up to six weeks for points to post in your Rapid Rewards account.
